pages.text: “Sakaulowa koma (kafiri) woipitsitsa kwambiri
“Yemwe amatsutsa (choona) ndi kunyoza (zisonyezo za Allah)
“Koma yemwe akuopa Allah kwambiri akatalikitsidwa ndi Moto
“Amene akupereka chuma chake ndi cholinga chodziyeretsa
“Ndipo palibe aliyense kwa iye, amene adamchitira za chifundo zomwe zikulipidwa
“Koma (akuchita zimenezi) kufuna chikondi cha Mbuye wake Wapamwambamwamba
“Ndipo posachedwa adzasangalala
“Ndikulumbilira mmawa dzuwa litakwera (imene ili nthawi yantchito)
“Ndi usiku pamene ukuvindikira
“Sadakusiye Mbuye wako (iwe Mneneri) (s.a.w) ndiponso sadakude
“Ndithu moyo watsiku lirimkudza ndi wabwino kwa iwe kuposa umoyo woyambawu
“Ndithu posachedwapa akupatsa Mbuye wako (zabwino zamdziko lapansi ndi tsiku lachimaliziro) ndipo ukondwera
“Kodi sadakupeze uli wa masiye ndipo adakupatsa pokhala pabwino
“Ndipo adakupeza uli wosazindikira (Qur’an) nakuongola (pokuzindikiritsa Qur’aniyo ndi malamulo a chipembedzo)
“Ndiponso adakupeza uli wosauka nakulemeretsa
“Basi, wamasiye usamchitire nkhanza
“Ndiponso wopempha usamukalipire
“Tsono mtendere wa Mbuye wako uwutchule (pothokoza ndi kugwira ntchito zabwino)
“Kodi sitidachiphanule chifuwa chako (pokupatsa chiongoko ndi chikhulupiliro ndi nzeru zambiri)
“Ndipo takuchotsera mtolo wako (pa ntchito yolalikira pokuthandiza ndi kukufewetsera zinthu zako)
“Mtolo umene udalemetsa msana wako
“Ndipo takukweza kutchulidwa kwako
“Ndipo ndithu pali chovuta palinso zabwino (Zambiri)
“Ndithu pali chovuta palinso zabwino (zambiri)
“Basi, ukamaliza ntchito (yolalikira ndi Jihâd) limbikira kupemphera
“Ndipo khala wolakalaka (zabwino zomwe zili) kwa Mbuye wako
